data.meanings: to descend, come down, go down, happen, alight at, settle in a place, lodge. anzala - to send down, give. nazulun - that which is prepared for a guest's entertainment, abode, gift. manzil - mansion, station. nazzala - to cause to descend, send down. tanziil - sending down, divine revelation, orderly arrangement and authentic compilation, gradual revelation.
data.sentence: The word نَزَّلَ comes from the root ن ز ل and is associated with the meanings: to descend, come down, go down, happen, alight at, settle in a place, lodge. anzala - to send down, give. nazulun - that which is prepared for a guest's entertainment, abode, gift. manzil - mansion, station. nazzala - to cause to descend, send down. tanziil - sending down, divine revelation, orderly arrangement and authentic compilation, gradual revelation.

data.meanings: o separate/distinguish/divide/split/decide. farqun - the act of distinction or separating. fariq - who separates, discriminates. firqun - separate part, heap. firqatun - band of human beings. fariqun - part/portion, some party or band of human beings. furqan - criterion of right or wrong, draft, evidence or demonstration, a name of The Quran, aid, victory, argument, proof, dawn, distinction.. faraqa (vb. 2) to make a division or distinction, make a schism. tafriq - division, dissension.. faraqa (vb. 3) To quit, depart.. mutafarriqun - diverse, different. fariqa - to fear, be frightened, plunge in the wave, seek refuge in fear, succour. yafraqu - to be timid and afraid, appear in one's true colour, be cowardly, be ridden by fear.
data.sentence: The word الْفُرْقَانَ comes from the root ف ر ق and is associated with the meanings: o separate/distinguish/divide/split/decide. farqun - the act of distinction or separating. fariq - who separates, discriminates. firqun - separate part, heap. firqatun - band of human beings. fariqun - part/portion, some party or band of human beings. furqan - criterion of right or wrong, draft, evidence or demonstration, a name of The Quran, aid, victory, argument, proof, dawn, distinction.. faraqa (vb. 2) to make a division or distinction, make a schism. tafriq - division, dissension.. faraqa (vb. 3) To quit, depart.. mutafarriqun - diverse, different. fariqa - to fear, be frightened, plunge in the wave, seek refuge in fear, succour. yafraqu - to be timid and afraid, appear in one's true colour, be cowardly, be ridden by fear.

data.meanings: to mark/sign/distinguish, creations/beings, world, science/learning/knowledge/information, aware/know. By means of which one knows a thing, hence it signifies world or creation, because by it the Creator is known. alim (pl. ulama) - one who is learned/wise or knows.
data.sentence: The word لِلْعَالَمِينَ comes from the root ع ل م and is associated with the meanings: to mark/sign/distinguish, creations/beings, world, science/learning/knowledge/information, aware/know. By means of which one knows a thing, hence it signifies world or creation, because by it the Creator is known. alim (pl. ulama) - one who is learned/wise or knows.

data.meanings: Lying down, kneeling or with legs folded making the chest touch the ground, falling upon the chestTo be or to become firm, steady, steadfast, fixed, continue, remain or stay in placePraying for someone or something, or blessings, felicitations, prospering and abounding in good (e.g. on food, or the saying God bless you)Keeping or applying constantly or persevering in something (e.g. affairs, commerce etc)Extolling God and His attributes, exalting God and/or magnifying GodStriving, laboring and/or exerting oneselfAn ancient name of the monthsA blessing, any good bestowed by God, increase, abundance and/or plenty.
data.sentence: The word تَبَارَكَ comes from the root ب ر ك and is associated with the meanings: Lying down, kneeling or with legs folded making the chest touch the ground, falling upon the chestTo be or to become firm, steady, steadfast, fixed, continue, remain or stay in placePraying for someone or something, or blessings, felicitations, prospering and abounding in good (e.g. on food, or the saying God bless you)Keeping or applying constantly or persevering in something (e.g. affairs, commerce etc)Extolling God and His attributes, exalting God and/or magnifying GodStriving, laboring and/or exerting oneselfAn ancient name of the monthsA blessing, any good bestowed by God, increase, abundance and/or plenty.

data.meanings: serve, worship, adore, venerate, accept the impression of a thing, obey with submissiveness or humility, approve, apply, devote, obedience, slave, keep to inseparably, subdue, assemble together, enslave.
data.sentence: The word عَبْدِهِ comes from the root ع ب د and is associated with the meanings: serve, worship, adore, venerate, accept the impression of a thing, obey with submissiveness or humility, approve, apply, devote, obedience, slave, keep to inseparably, subdue, assemble together, enslave.

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word لِيَكُونَ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.
data.sentence: The word نَذِيرًا comes from the root ن ذ ر and is associated with the meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.
